name: Meaningless story demo
description:
Meaningless story is my first real video game project. It's great to be able to put all your soul into a project that is close to your heart, and to want to give everything to make it happen.
The story will be divided into 7 chapters of different sizes, bringing us more and more towards an uncertain outcome.

The music, photos and sounds all come from royalty-free licenses. I plan to credit each person very soon. The images have been blurred for the visual need of the game, without violating the Royalty Free license.
